uvi.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.4.153
uvi.description:
bpf, s390: Fix potential memory leak about jit_data

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.153 by commit a326f9c01cfbee4450ae49ce618ae6cbc0f76842, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 1c8f9b91c456f5b47a377a0c8c5d4130fc39433a. For more details please see the references link.
